definition[0]: the people who belong to a particular organization or group
example[0]: That summer I left school and joined the ranks of  (=became one of) the unemployed.
example[1]: There were splits in the party ranks on this issue.
example[2]: The Democrats now face opposition from within their own ranks.
example[3]: Most are recruited from the ranks of people who studied Latin and Greek at university.
definition[1]: all the members of the army, navy etc who are not officers
example[4]: He rose from the ranks to become a Field Marshal  (=he became an officer after starting as an ordinary soldier).
